name: Pretending To Care
description:
You play as an adult man who has have a life with all kind of deprivations, instead of hating your life you had never care sleeping in the streets, until one day the world shows you what you been missing, Would you change your life or you'll be continuing caring for nothing?

This is the introducion of the game.

You can support the game and get the latest release on the next link Patreon
